Name Rascal/Libraries/RSF

Synopsis import RSF;
Description Rigi Standard Format (RSF) is a textual format to represent binary relations and is used to exchange relaional facts between different tools.

An RSF file consists of triples of the form 
RelName Elem1 Elem2
where RelName is the name of a relation and Elem1 and Elem2 are element values.
Examples 
call    main          printf  
call    main          listcreate  
data    main          FILE  
data    listcreate    List
defines two relations named call and data.
